item.title: Monster Teleports Bug? Project Insanity
item.dc:creator: @sorecheeny sorecheeny
item.description:
@sorecheeny wrote:

Alright, looking at this just doesn’t seem right:

[code]//1st tele option
case 9190:
if (c.teleAction == 1) {
//rock crabs
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2676, 3715, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 2) {
//barrows
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3565, 3314, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 3) {
//godwars
c.getPA().spellTeleport(2916, 3612, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 4) {
//varrock wildy
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3243, 3513, 0);
} else if (c.teleAction == 5) {
c.getPA().spellTeleport(3046,9779,0);
}

			if (c.dialogueAction == 10) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2845, 4832, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 11) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2786, 4839, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			} else if (c.dialogueAction == 12) {
				c.getPA().spellTeleport(2398, 4841, 0);
				c.dialogueAction = -1;
			}
			break;[/code]

Anyone know what is wrong with it? It doesn’t work in-game.

Read full topic
